title: Agua Branca Organic Fair
description: Located inside a large barn in Agua Branca Park. Local producers selling all-organic fruit, vegetables, bread, cakes, nuts, seeds, grains and more, with many vegan options. Also a small cafe outside.. Play area for children, arts & craft workshops, live music and more. Closest metro stop is Barra Funda (red line) and plenty of bus stops, too. Another organic fair is a couple of minutes walk away in a little hut just before the entrance to the park.
